markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Uncanny Agility](/Feats.aspx?ID=5680) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=776" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 34 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You have near-supernatural poise that lets you move swiftly across the most unsteady surfaces. You gain the [Steady Balance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5217) skill feat. You can Step into [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) caused by uneven ground, such as a rocky field, hilly incline, or rocking ship.
name: Uncanny Agility
